org.eclipse.persistence.json.bind.model

Class Customization

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.persistence.json.bind.model.Customization
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassCustomization, DefaultCustomization, PropertyCustomization

    public abstract class Customization
extends java.lang.Object
    Customization configuration for class or field. Configuration parsed from annotation is put here.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Customization(CustomizationBuilder builder)
      Copies properties from builder an creates immutable instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AdapterBinding getAdapterBinding()
      Adapter wrapper class with resolved generic information.

      Date formatter for formatting dates.
      DeserializerBinding getDeserializerBinding()
      Deserializer wrapper with resolved generic info.
      JsonbNumberFormatter getNumberFormat()
      Number format for formatting numbers.
      SerializerBinding getSerializerBinding()
      Serializer wrapper with resolved generic info.
      boolean isJsonbTransient()
      Skip marshalling / unmarshalling for this customization.
      boolean isNillable()
      Marshall null values to JSON.

      • isNillable

        public boolean isNillable()
        Marshall null values to JSON.
        Returns:
        if true marshalling null values is active

      • isJsonbTransient

        public boolean isJsonbTransient()
        Skip marshalling / unmarshalling for this customization. Works as java "transient" keyword.

      • getDateTimeFormatter

        public JsonbDateFormatter getDateTimeFormatter()
        Date formatter for formatting dates. If not set defaulted to javax.json.bind.annotation.JsonbDateFormat.DEFAULT_FORMAT.
        Returns:
        date format

        public JsonbNumberFormatter getNumberFormat()
